channel.title: Blogs on Recep Adiyaman | Bioinformatician
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Recep Adiyaman | Bioinformatician

item.title: From Static to Dynamic: The Future of Protein Modelling
item.description: Why we need to move beyond static snapshots to capture the full range of conformational dynamics in protein structure prediction.

item.title: Bridging the Gap: AI, MD, and De Novo Design
item.description: Integrating deep learning with molecular dynamics and local quality estimation to model mutants and novel folds.

item.title: Impact on Drug Discovery & Synthetic Biology
item.description: How dynamic modelling will accelerate therapeutic discovery and the design of next-generation enzymes.
